title: Early Access
content:
Access though.

Will my characters from Early Access be carried over to the Official release?

Sorry but no, you will have to start a new adventure in the official release.

Will Baldur's Gate 3 get modding support?

Yes, but not in Early Access.

What's the difficulty setting of Early Access?

There will be only one difficulty in Early Access release, more will be added in later updates.

Will there be a Dungeon Master mode in BG3?

The devs are working on it, but may not include it in Early Ac
